title: Exploring Inner Strength

miniTask.description: Reflect on a time when you felt strong and capable. Write down the details of that experience.
miniTask.instructions: Take 10 minutes to write in your journal about this experience. Focus on the emotions you felt and the actions you took.

reflectionPrompt: How can you draw on this experience of strength in your daily life? What steps can you take to cultivate this inner strength moving forward?
